name: TheAtlantic
text: In August 1870, Emily Dickinson was nearly 40 and more comfortable in her skin than in previous years. @MarthaAckmann writes about a rare, face-to-face encounter that revealed a different side to the reclusive poet: https://t.co/G4DJeZ8Rw5

name: TheAtlantic
text: "[DACA recipients] are frequently portrayed as one of two things: disposable lawbreakers or precocious savants. What gets lost is the immense variety of backgrounds, beliefs, and attitudes represented in a group of 700,000 Americans," @JinNotJim writes: https://t.co/MQGvBoMZQq

name: TheAtlantic
text: Many people may want to shield their kids from the news right now, but research shows that children do better when their parents are honest about tragedy, @katejulian writes: https://t.co/xUWOVMTBDF

name: TheAtlantic
text: "The scale of America‚Äôs carceral system requires weakening constitutional protections in order to function. The resulting direct costs and collateral disadvantages are experienced almost entirely by communities of color," @TahirDuckett writes: https://t.co/UmWQXdVqk7

name: TheAtlantic
text:
The United States economy hit its low and has started recovering. But economists see four major factors weighing on the economy. The latest Atlantic Daily, from @mimbsy:
https://t.co/GjHHjnRNcv

name: TheAtlantic
text: The street photographer Clay Benskin shows his subjects as individuals with secrets and stories that the viewer can only guess at. https://t.co/z707rMWiPT

name: TheAtlantic
text: "After 12 years of feasting on white identity politics with a black man and a woman as its preeminent villains, the Republican Party is struggling to run its Obama-era culture-war playbook against an old, moderate white guy," writes @AdamSerwer: https://t.co/DbNmgRSTvI

name: TheAtlantic
text: "What presidents do can change the way the people and public officials alike understand what the Constitution permits. Do the recent events at Lafayette Square now count as part of the canon of presidential precedent?" @DebPearlstein writes: https://t.co/6lmsxXjxqi

name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @prashantrao: "The world can see into America, but America cannot look back. And today, the ugliness that is on display is amplified, not calmed, by the American president." ‚Äî @TomMcTague in @TheAtlantic https://t.co/PipK02wMUg

name: TheAtlantic
text: "The president has a talent for sniffing out those places in the legal order where a would-be authoritarian can act out his ideal of governance with minimal restraint," writes @qjurecic: https://t.co/YaZd8VQgeU

name: TheAtlantic
text: "Frightened, angry, essential: This is American labor during the coronavirus pandemic. Decades of economic trends and legal shifts have tilted the balance of power in the employer-employee relationship toward corporations," @AnnieLowrey writes: https://t.co/jI930ffKfE

name: TheAtlantic
text: In a new book, researchers describe three impossible demands of American life: being a perfect worker, being a perfect parent, and having a perfect body. Working parents bear the burden of all three, one of the authors told @jpinsk: https://t.co/FeDdglBas8

name: TheAtlantic
text: "If we are to lead the movements that intend to speak for us, we need the material conditions in place to thrive. The Bostock decision makes room for more of us to live and lead," @chasestrangio writes: https://t.co/eTsUkjlaEN

name: TheAtlantic
text: Nearly one in five Americans says they have participated in a recent protest, but what do mass demonstrations actually accomplish? @zeynep explains: https://t.co/myTq6SU67O

name: TheAtlantic
text: "The issue here is not merely physical assaults on statues, but a failure to distinguish between the problematic or objectionable and the irredeemably wrong," @EliotACohen writes: https://t.co/XQSuVPBSMq

name: TheAtlantic
text: ‚ÄúWhen I started ‚ÄòThe Daily Show,‚Äô¬†we were still living in an analog political world. Now that it‚Äôs a digital world ‚Ä¶ the gravity of it is just harder to escape, and it‚Äôs further removed from the real facts on the ground,‚Äù Jon Stewart tells @davidlsims. https://t.co/IX7epGOZqh
